Bubble.Name: Bubble
Description: Iterate through the array comparing consecutive number pairs
and swapping them if they're out of order.  Repeat until no
swaps occur.  Each iteration effectively 'bubbles' up the largest

Selection.Name: Selection
Description: Iterate through the array keeping track of the index of the
smallest value.  Swap the values at the starting index and the
lowest value index.  Repeat starting at the next index until end

Insertion.Name: Insertion
Description: Iterate through the array starting at index 1, store value in
a temporary variable.  Compare temp value to values to the left
of it.  If out of order, shift to the right.  Continue until index
0 is reached or a value that is in the correct order is found.
Repeat iteration starting at the next index until all indices have
